import { useState } from 'react' import './Products.css' function Products({products}) { const [step, setStep] = useState(0) const perPage = 20 const pags = Math.ceil(products.length / perPage) const handlePrev = () => setStep(step > 0 ? step - 1 : pags - 1) const handleNext = () => setStep((step + 1) % pags) return (
{products.slice(step * perPage, (step + 1) * perPage).map(product =>

{product.name}

{product.description}

{product.price}â‚¬
)}
) } export default Products
